divs: sighting detailsnot sure the exact time or day, i was about 15 years old when this happened. i still remember it like it was yesterday... i was over at a friends house just outside of ashley, oh when we noticed 3 lights in the sky. stars were out, but these lights were much brighter than any star in the sky. the formation they were in was a triangle shape and they seemed to be strobing lights back and forth as a form of communication. they moved away from each other slowly, but kept the same formation. then what seemed only an instant, they went in three different directions faster than my eyes could move and vanished over the horizon (north, west and south) the next day my friends electricity didn't work. his father called an electrician and the guy arrived w\in 15 mins... how often does that happen? the electrician greeted us, asked for the fuse box and then started talking about aliens... it was off-putting since we had the sighting and did not mention to this fellow about it and he brings it up like its the talk of the town. he spoke about aliens and sightings for probably 30 mins and neither my friend or i mentioned anything about the sighting. the most erie part was when he was about to leave, he looked at us with a strange grin and whispered to only my friend and i, "remember, they are only weather balloons... it's probably best to leave it at that". when the electrician left, my friends dad (who watched the lights with us) made a comment about how strange that was and how the guy didn't seem to do anything but flip a switch outside and his electric was back on. that is the only sighting i have witnessed. if you lived around the same area and had the same sighting, please feel free to email me. would be nice to discuss it further with someone who doesn't think i am crazy...
Summary: 3 Lights hover in sequence, then instantly take off in different directions
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ashley
There were no other sightings in Ashley on or around November 30th 1994
